title: StrafeNetwork a new Tournament Organisation

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
__**Introducing the StrafeNetwork**__

**What is the StrafeNetwork?** 
- StrafeNetwork is an international organisation focused on tournaments in many popular games like League of Legends, Counter Strike, Rainbow 6, osu! and more...
- We have a good array of staff such as Moderators, Commentators, Admins and Referees (if the community grows larger, we will open more staff applications) 
- Our mission is to open up multiple tournaments based on Seasons. We started doing tournaments in osu! and decided to make it even bigger since it worked pretty well. 

**What are we planning to do?**
Currently we are trying to grow into a larger community so that we can make bigger tournaments with an actual prize pool.
We are trying to make it international so that everyone can join us! 

**What do we offer?**
- A good team of staff
- Our own Developers, Commentators and Referees 
- 2 Discord servers (Community/Tournament)
- Our own Content Creators and Social Media (Twitch/YouTube/Twitter)
- A nice, helpful and fun community
- Our own website

**What do we want?**
- We want you to have fun in our tournaments and to respect each other! Nothing more. 

If you are Interested, click the followed link to join a great and nice community:
https://discord.gg/u4Ps6Mc

For our tournaments, please join our tournament Discord:
https://discord.gg/xtZv7b5
